channel.title: TPL Recap Pod
channel.itunes:author: Alexander Petros
channel.description: A podcast about the TPL Pokemon Draft League intended for an audience that might, but is not likely to, exceed twelve.

item.title: S5 W5 Recap, Kevin Interview
item.description: Pilot Episode. Standings after week 5. Kevin apologizes for Will-O-Wisp/Destiny Bond/Memento/Trick Flame Orb Mismagius, and explains how he pulled off the week's biggest upset.
item.content:encoded:
Pilot Episode. Standings after week 5. Kevin apologizes for Will-O-Wisp/Destiny Bond/Memento/Trick Flame Orb Mismagius, and explains how he pulled off the week's biggest upset.

Links:

  • W4 Kevin vs Nic - Showdown
  • W5 Kevin vs Kirk - Showdown

item.title: S5 W6 Recap, Mason Interview
item.description: Standings after week 6. Mason clarifies the importance of Klawf, talks about his proudest win of the season, and forecasts the road ahead for the league's most likely playoff contenders.
item.content:encoded:
Standings after week 6. Mason clarifies the importance of Klawf, talks about his proudest win of the season, and forecasts the road ahead for the league's most likely playoff contenders.

Links:

  • W6 Mason vs Bird - Showdown
  • W6 Morry vs Sean - Showdown

item.title: S5 Trades, with Mason and Justin
item.description: Alex, Mason, and Justin sit down to discuss everyone's trades right before the Week 7 deadline.
item.content:encoded:
Alex, Mason, and Justin sit down to discuss everyone's trades right before the Week 7 deadline.

Trades

GM Dropped Acquired
Zack Iron Moth, Ogerpon-Wellspring, Brambleghast, Beartic Baxcalibur, Thundurus, Scizor
George Klefki, Toxicroak, Bisharp Blastoise, Barraskewda
Pat Shaymin, Alolan-Persian, Eiscue, Swampert Inteleon, Ogerpon-Cornerstone, Quagsire
Alex Spidops, Primeape Vikavolt
Bird Dusclops, Politoed, Kingdra Forretress, Toxapex, Bastiodon
Morry Landorus-I, Mabosstiff, Haunter Latios, Sableye, Ariados
Sean Zoroark-H Pecharunt
Zack Cryogonal Tauros-Paldea-Combat
Justin Enamorus-T Mimikyu, Primeape
Mason Ambipom, Scyther Skeledirge
Kevin Lokix, Fezandipity Azelf, Virizion
